name: Playback
description:
What do your friends think of you? Playback is the place to find out, where friends tell you what songs remind them of you.

How does it work?
1) Add your friends
2) Pick a playlist to listen to songs, pick who each song reminds you of
3) Get hearts when you get picked by someone for a song
4) View the Top Songs you were picked for on your profile

What are you waiting for? Time to playback!
